name: Fidget Spinner - The Spin Simulator Glow
name_original: Fidget Spinner - The Spin Simulator Glow
description:
The official fidget spinner simulator [Glow Edition]

Spin the fidget spinner to increased focus and relieve stress.
Or simply test your spinning skills to unlock more spinners!
____________________________________________

• 20 different spinners
• 5+ different backgrounds
• Purchase our spinners through the app
____________________________________________

Challenge a friend to see who can spin more!
